price: Kako Allah da uputi na Pravi put narod koji ne vjeruje nakon što je vjerovao i svjedočio da je Poslanik istina, i Jasni dokazi su mu došli!? Allah neće uputiti na Pravi put narod koji nepravdu čini.
arabic: كَيۡفَ يَهۡدِي ٱللَّهُ قَوۡمٗا كَفَرُواْ بَعۡدَ إِيمَٰنِهِمۡ وَشَهِدُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱلرَّسُولَ حَقّٞ وَجَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتُۚ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يَهۡدِي ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: kayfa yahdī al-lahu qawman kafarū baʿda īmānihim washahidū anna al-rasūla ḥaqqun wajāahumu al-bayinātu wal-lahu lā yahdī al-qawma al-ẓālimīna
